<div class="card reveal">
  
# Team 5

We are graduate students in the **Master of Applied Business Analytics (MABA)** program at  
**Boston University Metropolitan College**, completing this project for  
**AD 688 – Web Analytics**.

Our work integrates labor market analytics, machine learning, gender disparities research,  
and cloud-based data engineering practices.

</div>
